org.apache.cassandra.repair

Enum RepairParallelism

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RepairParallelism>
      • org.apache.cassandra.repair.RepairParallelism
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RepairParallelism>

    public enum RepairParallelism
extends java.lang.Enum<RepairParallelism>
    Specify the degree of parallelism when calculating the merkle trees in a repair job.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DATACENTER_AWARE
      One node per data center at a time
      PARALLEL
      All nodes at the same time
      SEQUENTIAL
      One node at a time
